welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chula Vista, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, stunning coastal views, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Lolitas Taco Shop
restaurants.description: Lolitas Taco Shop is a taco restaurant located in Chula Vista.
restaurants.address: 601 E Palomar St, Chula Vista, CA 91911

restaurants.name: Mandarin Chinese Restaurant
restaurants.description: Mandarin Chinese Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in Chula Vista.
restaurants.address: 945 Otay Lakes Rd #A, Chula Vista, CA 91913

restaurants.name: TJ Oyster Bar II
restaurants.description: TJ Oyster Bar II is a seafood restaurant located in Bonita.
restaurants.address: 4410 Bonita Rd (at Otay Lakes Rd), Bonita, CA 91902

restaurants.name: Izakaya Naruto
restaurants.description: Izakaya Naruto is a japanese restaurant located in Chula Vista.

restaurants.name: La Bella Pizza Garden
restaurants.description: La Bella Pizza Garden is a pizzeria located in Chula Vista.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brown Field Municipal Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights at Brown Field Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Island NAS Airport Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Island NAS Airport, serving both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is the oldest terminal at San Diego International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is the largest terminal at San Diego International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2 West
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is connected to Terminal 2 via a walkway.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for the first 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gillespie Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is specifically for private flights and offers a more luxurious experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
